experience.title: Software Engineer
details: Led design and implementation of both public and on-prem cloud solutions based on service-oriented microservice architectures using Linux Docker containers while following 12-factor best practices.
Built many different user interfaces using the latest versions of Angular and React.
Other UI libraries/frameworks included Angular Material, MineralUI, PrimeNG, Chart.js and Handsontable.
Designed and implemented various REST and websocket APIs using ExpressJS and SocketIO libraries in Node.
Created GraphQL services and connected front- and back-ends using Apollo Client & Server for Javascript. Facilitated inter-service communication through Kafka.
Persisted application, session and customer data in MongoDB.
Published Node libraries to Artifactory that employed the provider pattern and other design patterns to model application data and simplify the interfaces to Mongo and Kafka.
Created a React windows desktop application using ElectronJS.
Built dozens of POCs to validate potential technologies for adoption into our solutions. Integrated git with Jenkins and automated CI through jobs and pipelines.
Led code reviews, sprint plannings, and backlog groomings.
Demoed features and functionality to stakeholders.
Developed CLIs and created compose files to facilitate development for engineers.

experience.title: Associate Software Engineer
details: Developed Migration Applications in Java and various conversion tools in REXX for CA Services.
